title: Control Component Extracted Verification Cards Payload
description: A payload encompassing the encryption group, the election event id, the control component's node id, the extracted verification cards needed by the Dispute Resolver tool and the digital signature.

encryptionGroup.description: The encryption group of the election event.

electionEventId.description: A random 32 characters hexadecimal string identifying the election event. Corresponds to ee in the specification.

nodeId.description: The node identifying the control component. Corresponds to the CC's index j in the specification.

items.description: The extracted verification card. Corresponds to evc in the specification.

extractedVerificationCards.description: The extracted verification cards. Has length N_S. Corresponds to (evc_0,...,evc_N_S-1) in the specification.
